title: Calories in Champagne
meta_description: Discover calories in champagne per standard glass, including carbs, alcohol content, and nutrition breakdown for brut varieties.
assumptions: Standard 150 ml glass of brut (dry) champagne; values for non-vintage, typical sparkling wine.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, sweetness level (brut, extra dry), serving size, and vintage; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 150 ml glass of brut champagne contains about 120 kcal, mostly from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a glass of champagne?
faqs.a: About 120 kcal for a standard 150 ml glass of brut champagne.

faqs.q: How does sweetness affect calories in champagne?
faqs.a: Sweeter varieties like demi-sec add 20-50 kcal per glass from extra sugar.
